background.--currentTab: background id of the gradient of the current tab
background.--usedIds: id used for backgrounds -> needed since some backgrounds are only locally available

--clockFormat: format of the clock, either 12h for 00:00-23:59 or am/pm for 12:00pm - 11:59pm
--collapseNotes: if notes get collapsed once not focused anymore
--dateFormat: id of dateformat as in dateFormat array in variables.js
--language: language id as in languages array in variables.js
